column1: - Your pain has not improved with other treatment.
Others will want to have joint replacement surgery in order to continue with sports and other activities they enjoy.
Knee or hip replacements are most often done in people who are 60 and older.
This means these surgeries are done to provide relief for your pain, not for any other medical reason.
In some cases, the provider may strongly recommend surgery if deformity or extreme wear and tear on the joint affects other parts of your body.
